description:
Store Clouds is a bank of mobile web applications. The program also handles applications from the Apple Web Apps Store in the offering for mobile palm. Each user can add his web application to the library to enrich them with features that web apps store more than 1700 applications.
Clouds shade is very light because its interface is stored online which also allows more fluidity in the navigation between menus and web applications.
In conclusion, Store Clouds can use simple web applications that enrich the everyday user of both individuals and professionals.
